resources.string: Descriptions are not available\nor have not been added yet
This is one of the options for describing the object
You can evaluate any of the descriptions. The most appreciated of them will be displayed above the others.
If you register, you can evaluate any of the descriptions. The most appreciated of them will be displayed above the others.
If you want to add your own description, click this button.
If you register, you can add your own description.
